import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import LogoTitleH from '../../assets/images/H.png' import LogoTitleL from '../../assets/images/L.png' import Logo from './Logo' import './index.scss' const Home = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const nameArray = ['e', 'n', 'g', 'k', 'u', 'a', 'n'] const programArray = [ 'w', 'e', 'b', ' ', 'd', 'e', 'v', 'e', 'l', 'o', 'p', 'e', 'r', '.', ] useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) return ( <>

H i,
I 'm u

MS in Computer Science / new Grad

CONTACT ME
) } export default Home
